name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a Senior Cloud Engineer with 8 years of experience, I have a strong foundation in **Azure**, **M365**, and **Identity** management, ensuring compliance and security across cloud services. My expertise includes hands-on experience with **PowerShell** for automation and administration, enabling efficient **migration** strategies and **architecture** for cloud solutions. I excel in implementing **Zero-Trust** security models, managing **MFA**, and supporting BYOD initiatives to enhance enterprise security posture.

My technical skills also extend to developing infrastructure as code (IaC) solutions and architecting **Azure Landing Zones** for scalable cloud environments. With a proven track record in **3rd-Level-Support**, I solve complex technical challenges to ensure smooth operation and security compliance.

In addition to cloud engineering, I am proficient in full-stack development utilizing **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter**. My experience spans frameworks like **React**, **Next.js**, **Node.js**, and **FastAPI**, complemented by a strong background in microservices architecture and CI/CD automation. I have successfully led projects in the healthcare and financial sectors, integrating AI/ML capabilities for predictive analytics and real-time data processing.
